meta.description: Optimize the selection of distribution centers and transportation routes to minimize total costs while meeting store demands.

params.name: opening_cost
params.description: Opening costs for each distribution center

params.name: transport_cost
params.description: Transportation cost per unit from each distribution center to each store

params.name: demand
params.description: Demand of each retail store in units

params.name: capacity
params.description: Supply capacity of each distribution center in units

vars.name: open_center
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a distribution center is opened

vars.name: supply
vars.description: Units of goods supplied from a distribution center to a store

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(opening_cost[c] * open_center[c] for c in CENTERS) + sum(transport_cost[c][s] * supply[c][s] for c in CENTERS for s in STORES)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of opening distribution centers and transporting goods

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_1
constraints.description: Ensure demand of store 1 is met

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_2
constraints.description: Ensure demand of store 2 is met

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_3
constraints.description: Ensure demand of store 3 is met

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_4
constraints.description: Ensure demand of store 4 is met

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_5
constraints.description: Ensure demand of store 5 is met

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_1
constraints.description: Do not exceed capacity of center 1 if opened

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_2
constraints.description: Do not exceed capacity of center 2 if opened

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_3
constraints.description: Do not exceed capacity of center 3 if opened

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_4
constraints.description: Do not exceed capacity of center 4 if opened

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_5
constraints.description: Do not exceed capacity of center 5 if opened

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_6
constraints.description: Do not exceed capacity of center 6 if opened

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_7
constraints.description: Do not exceed capacity of center 7 if opened
